channel.title: 317 Ingame SHADOW Font Help
channel.description:
I'm interested in getting a a text font shadow (kinda like bold) for the yellbox (specifically for the light colors like pink and yellow).
I can't find it. I've spent hours looking for anything. I couldn't find anything with the chat fonts either.
Whac

item.title: 317 Ingame SHADOW Font Help
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

Does anyone know how to do this?

Bainscape is a server that makes use of this shadow effect.

I found out that this effect is already implemented by Jagex. If you type ::players or any general interface you can see the “close window” button using this effect. But how do you make effect of it in the chatbox?

Read full topic

item.title: 317 Ingame SHADOW Font Help
item.dc:creator: @Mayhem2 Mayhem,
item.description:
@Mayhem2 wrote:

[quote=“Devinhdl, post:2, topic:410661”]like for testing, you can type “::yell <col=4324><shad=5>text here”
experiment with the colors, thats just how to change the yell texts while your yelling, just use that code in you commands or client.

**Unless you are using lk a really old 317 then idk how to add shadow lol[/quote]
/facepalm.
If it’s delta it’ll take a little bit of work.

PI pretty easy.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 Ingame SHADOW Font Help
item.dc:creator: @Devinhdl Devinhdl
item.description:
@Devinhdl wrote:

like for testing, you can type “::yell <col=4324><shad=5>text here”
experiment with the colors, thats just how to change the yell texts while your yelling, just use that code in you commands or client.

**Unless you are using lk a really old 317 then idk how to add shadow lol

Read full topic
